welcome_message: Using the Fragment tool, you can revive your dead domains!
config_input: Provide a VLESS/VMESS/TROJAN configuration with WS/GRPC type:
config_form_cleanip_tooltip: Enter an IPv4/IPv6 or the address of one of the websites hosted on CDN Cloudflare
config_form_qrcode_alert: After scanning the QR code, it may be necessary to perform a "subscription update" in some apps.
config_switch_tls_tooltip: the ability to switch between TLS Fragment and TCP Segment
config_switch_insecure_tooltip: The ability to control the "Allow Insecure" option
config_switch_earlydata_tooltip: Improving the loading speed of websites and apps that send/receive data with the API
config_switch_mux_tooltip: Improving connection establishment speed and reducing latency in sending & receiving data
config_switch_direct_rule_tooltip: Routing rules (directing traffic for IP and domains in IR & CN)
config_mux_concurrency_tooltip: Choose a number between 1 and 1024 (8 is recommended as the default value)
config_app_name_nekoray_tooltip: to use the fragment in Nekoray, you need to switch the core from the settings of this application to XRAY
config_app_name_napsternetV_tooltip: by selecting NapsternetV, the Routing Rules option will be turned off
